REGISTER_COMMAND_TOOLTIP: Click to register your access into the system
REGISTER_SUCCESS: Your access has been registered, check your email for the activation link
REGISTER_LINK: Click to register, if you have not done it  yet
LOGIN_LINK: Click to login, if you already have access
ACTIVATION_LINK: Click to send activation mail again
CHANGE_PASSWORD_COMMAND_TOOLTIP: Click to change your current password
